item.description: How to install dirver of mellanox ConnectX 3 10Gbps netowrk adapter in proxmox-ve 5.x or diban 9 To  Install dependencies software 1 2 3 #dependencies apt-get -y install debhelper autotools-dev dkms zlib1g-dev python wget quilt python-libxml2 swig dpatch graphviz chrpath pve-headers Download driver for mellanox connectx 3 for debian 9.6 1 wget http://content.mellanox.com/ofed/MLNX_EN-4.6-1.0.1.1/mlnx-en-4.6-1.0.1.1-debian9.6-x86_64.tgz Install drivers 1 2 3 4 tar -zxvf mlnx-en-4.6-1.0.1.1-debian9.6-x86_64.tgz cd mlnx-en-4.
